ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities in the ppy/osu-wiki repository include several pull requests focused on adding lazer mods to the Game modifier section in various languages, including Spanish, and further cleanup of the Chat console page. These changes aim to improve the wiki's content and accuracy, with contributors testing their changes against the contribution checklist and awaiting review from fluent speakers for translations.

ppy/osu.summary: The ppy/osu repository has seen significant activity with multiple pull requests addressing various aspects of the game. These include fixes such as not forcing a miss on sliders with strict tracking active if tracking is lost before the head is judged, pausing playback when entering gameplay test from the editor, and adjusting the position of hit errors in certain game modes. Additionally, there are efforts to improve performance through pooling of hit objects in the taiko mode, aiming to reduce unnecessary object creation and improve overall gameplay experience.
